name: Roguecraft
description:
A little sandbox roguelike game for 7DRL 2020.

Controls
  • Numpad or vi keys - Move around
  • Shift + Numpad - Change direction without moving
  • Z - Use/Place item you're holding
  • X - Open inventory (Z - select)
  • C - Craft
Tips
  • Gather some wood and stones, then make an axe and a pickaxe first.
  • You need chop multiple times to chop down trees.
  • You can dismantle furnitures using an axe or a pickaxe.
  • There are no monsters for now... sorry :P
